oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: New Providence Speedway
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of a car at the New Providence Speedway. William Johnson, Jr., left, is the son of the owner of the car.The writing on the car reads "Colored Drivers, Rough and Tough."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Automobile racing
